card.name: Form of Disaster
card.ability: Cesar has 4 Threat Level Counters. He begins a duel with none of these counters.
The first time Cesar would be defeated by damage during a duel, he remains at 1 life and becomes stunned instead.
During each Ante Step, he gains one Threat Level Counter and the corresponding effect below. When Cesar would gain his 5th counter, he discards all Threat Level Counters instead.
